[[Version 4.6]]
* Added Quick Obtain function for Replicas and Missing Furnishings from Furnishing Sets.
* Added Queued List for adding Furnishings in one Furnishing Set to Creation Queue.
* Added Obtain All in Creation Queue to claim multiple completed Furnishings or use multiple [[Vial of Adeptal Speed|Vials of Adeptal Speed]] at once.
* Increased the maximum number of Creation Queues from 5 to 10.
* Added discounts to Furnishings and Furnishing Blueprints in Realm Depot released before [[Version 2.8]].
* Increased the purchase limit of some items in Furnishings Shop.
* Added filtering and search functions to the Realm Depot's Furnishings and Furnishing Blueprints tabs.
* Added [[Radiant Spincrystal]] number needed to unlock [[Realm Music]] in [[Euphonium Unbound]] Furnishings.
* Optimized display order of music in Euphonium Unbound Furnishings.

[[Version 4.3]]
* Added "Multi-Select Mode" to drag-select multiple furnishings to move, store, and create custom sets in bulk.
* Updated "Single-Select Mode" when clicking the blank area will confirm placement, whereas clicking another furnishing will switch to selecting the corresponding furnishing.
* Added serial numbers to the Replica screen.
* When the [[Realm Currency]] is full, the Tubby's dialogue option for going to redeem it ("Trust Rank") will light up.
* Optimized the Furnishing Schematics screen:
** When starting to create furnishings or switch back to the Furnishing Schematics screen from another furnishing creation screen, the list of Furnishing Schematics will no longer refresh and cause selected position to be lost.
** A source link to the "Convert Wood" screen has been added for wood materials on the Furnishing Schematics screen.
** On the Furnishing Schematics screen, Teapot Spirit Trust Rank markers will no longer be displayed for furnishings that the player has not made before but are currently in the process of making.
* Added the Realm Layout [[Swirling Isles]].

* Added the source of each furnishing to the item description.
